element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm calculates the length of the longest flow path uphill of each cell.

element.name: DEM
element.text: Digital Elevation Model. It should be a sink-filled DEM, since flow routing algorithms are used to trace the longest flow path.

element.name: THRESHOLD
element.text:
If the field "Use threshold" is selected, the resulting value is not the length of the longest flow path uphill, but instead the length the longest uphill path without slope changes above this threshold.
Slope changes are calculated as the ratio of the slope in a cell and the slope in the one located inmediatly uphill.

element.name: USETHRESHOLD
element.text: Select this to use a threshold to interrupt the measurement of flow paths when a large change in slope occurs.

element.name: SLOPELENGTH
element.text: The values in this layer represent the length of the longest flow path uphill of each cell.
